feed.title: Help a Jew. Help the Holy Land
feed.subtitle: Help a Jew. Help the Holy Land is a group of dedicated legal professionals who want to help those who have been denied their right to return to the Holy Land

entry.title: Introducing: Help a Jew - Help the Holy Land

link.title: Introducing: Help a Jew - Help the Holy Land

entry.content:
Welcome to Help a Jew - Help the Holy Land. We’re glad you’re here! Together, we can help Jews stuck in the former Soviet Union to make Israel their home. After all, it’s both their God-given and legal right to do so.

On this website, you will find some insights into why it’s not so simple for many Jews to repatriate to the Promised Land and what we are doing about it.
entry.summary: Welcome to Help a Jew - Help the Holy Land. We’re glad you’re here! Together, we can help Jews stuck in the former Soviet Union to make Israel their home. After all, it’s both their God-given and legal right to do so.
